compounddef.innerclass: space::is_ranges< T, std::conditional_t< false, is_ranges_helper< typename T::value_type, decltype(std::declval< T >().size()), decltype(std::declval< T >().begin()), decltype(std::declval< T >().end()) >, void > >

memberdef.name: CRTP_IMPL
memberdef.initializer: friend Base; protected

memberdef.name: MACRO_CAT
memberdef.initializer: MACRO_CAT_I(A, B)

memberdef.initializer: REST

memberdef.name: UNIQ
memberdef.initializer: MACRO_CAT(BASE, __LINE__)

memberdef.name: PACK
memberdef.initializer: std::forward_as_tuple(__VA_ARGS__)

briefdescription.para: Macros used to output debuf info.

memberdef.name: EXPR
memberdef.initializer: , X, CONTAINER) \ [&](){ using Type = std::remove_reference_v<decltype(CONTAINER)>; Type result; \ if constexpr(is_reservable<Type>::value){ \ result.reserve(CONTAINER.size()) \ } \ std::transform(std::begin(CONTAINER), std::end(CONTAINER), std::back_inserter(result), [](auto& X) { return EXPR; });\ return result;}()

memberdef.name: SPACEHUB_MAKE_CONSTRUCTORS
SPACEHUB_USING_TYPE_SYSTEM_OF
memberdef.initializer: template<typename ..._T_> \ using Container = typename CLASS::template Container<_T_...>; \ \ using Scalar = typename CLASS::Scalar; \ using ScalarArray = typename CLASS::ScalarArray; \ using IdxArray = typename CLASS::IdxArray; \ using IntArray = typename CLASS::IntArray; \ using Vector = typename CLASS::Vector; \ using VectorArray = typename CLASS::VectorArray; \ using Coord = typename CLASS::Coord

memberdef.name: DECLARE_CRTP_ACCESSOR
DECLARE_CRTP_READ_ACCESSOR
SPACEHUB_STD_ACCESSOR
SPACEHUB_READ_ACCESSOR
SPACEHUB_CONDITIONAL_ACCESSOR
SPACEHUB_CONDITIONAL_READ_ACCESSOR
CREATE_METHOD_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: template<typename T, typename... Args> \ struct has_method_##NAME \ { \ template<typename U> \ constexpr static auto check(const void*) \ ->decltype(std::declval<U>().NAME(std::declval<Args>()...), std::true_type()); \ \ template<typename U> \ constexpr static std::false_type check(...); \ \ static constexpr bool value = decltype(check<T>(nullptr))::value; \ };

memberdef.name: HAS_METHOD
memberdef.initializer: has_method_##METHOD<CLASS, ##__VA_ARGS__>::value

memberdef.name: CREATE_PROTECTED_METHOD_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: template<typename __T, typename... __Args> \ struct has_protected_method_##NAME : public __T \ { \ template<typename U> \ constexpr static auto check(const void*) \ ->decltype(std::declval<has_protected_method_##NAME<U, __Args...> >().NAME(std::declval<__Args>()...), std::true_type());\ \ template<typename U> \ constexpr static std::false_type check(...); \ \ static constexpr bool value = decltype(check<__T>(nullptr))::value; \ };

memberdef.name: HAS_PROTECTED_METHOD
memberdef.initializer: has_protected_method_##METHOD<CLASS, ##__VA_ARGS__>::value

memberdef.name: CREATE_CRTP_IMPLEMENTATION_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: CREATE_PROTECTED_METHOD_CHECK(impl_##NAME) CREATE_METHOD_CHECK(NAME)

memberdef.name: HAS_CRTP_IMPLEMENTATION
memberdef.initializer: has_protected_method_impl_##METHOD<CLASS, ##__VA_ARGS__>::value && has_method_##METHOD<CLASS, ##__VA_ARGS__>::value

memberdef.name: CREATE_MEMBER_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: template<typename __T, typename __V = bool> \ struct has_ ## MEMBER : std::false_type { }; \ \ template<typename __T> \ struct has_ ## MEMBER \ < \ __T, \ typename std::enable_if \ < \ !std::is_same<decltype(std::declval<__T>().MEMBER), void>::value, bool \ >::type \ >: std::true_type { };

briefdescription.para: Macros used to check if a class has a member.

memberdef.name: HAS_MEMBER
memberdef.initializer: has_ ## member<C>::value

memberdef.name: CREATE_STATIC_MEMBER_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: \ template<typename T, typename V = bool> \ struct has_static ## MEMBER : std::false_type { }; \ \ template<typename T> \ struct has_static ## MEMBER \ < \ T, \ typename std::enable_if \ < \ !std::is_same<decltype(T::MEMBER), void>::value, bool \ >::type \ >: std::true_type { };

detaileddescription.para: Macros used to check if a class has a static member.

memberdef.name: HAS_STATIC_MEMBER
memberdef.initializer: has_static ## member<C>::value

memberdef.name: CHECK_METHOD

briefdescription.para: Macros used to static_assert if a class has a specific method.

memberdef.name: CHECK_MEMBER
memberdef.initializer: static_assert(has_ ## MB<C>::value, \ "Template argument '" # CLASS "' must have member '" # MB "'. ");

briefdescription.para: Macros used to static_assert if a class has a member.

memberdef.name: CHECK_STATIC_MEMBER

briefdescription.para: Macros used to static_assert if a class has a static member.

memberdef.name: CHECK_TYPE
memberdef.initializer: static_assert(std::is_same< typename T1::Types, typename T2::Types>::value, \ "Template argument '" #T1 "' and '" #T2 "' must have the same type of the type member(space::ProtoType<...>)");

briefdescription.para: Macros used to static_assert if two class have the same base type set.

memberdef.name: CHECK_POD
memberdef.initializer: static_assert(std::is_trivial<DATA>::value, "Template arg '" #DATA "' must be a POD type!");

memberdef.name: IS_BASE_OF
memberdef.initializer: (std::is_base_of<BASE, DERIVED>::value)

memberdef.name: TYPE_OF_SELF
memberdef.initializer: std::remove_reference<decltype(*this)>::type
